nutrition.prompt: Batch prep colorful vegetables for lunches
nutrition.reminder: Set a Sunday calendar block labeled 'prep rainbow boxes'.
Place a full water bottle beside the coffee station.

stress.reminder: Use wearable haptic reminders to cue breathing cycles.
Keep a small notebook near the dining area.

sleep.reminder: Trigger smart lights to warm tones at the cutoff time.
Prep tea sachets in a visible countertop tray.
